mapper.select: SELECT * FROM APPROVAL A, USER_DB U WHERE A.USER_ID = U.USER_ID

SELECT * FROM APPROVAL A, USER_DB U WHERE A.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND ((A.USER_ID1 = #{user_id} AND A.OK1 IS NOT NULL) OR (A.USER_ID2 = #{user_id} AND A.OK2 IS NOT NULL) OR (A.USER_ID3 = #{user_id} AND A.OK3 IS NOT NULL))
AND A.A_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND A.A_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
ORDER BY A.A_NUM DESC LIMIT #{startPost}, #{viewPost}

SELECT COUNT(A_NUM) AS TOTALPOST FROM APPROVAL WHERE (USER_ID1 = #{user_id} AND OK1 IS NOT NULL) OR (USER_ID2 = #{user_id} AND OK2 IS NOT NULL) OR (USER_ID3 = #{user_id} AND OK3 IS NOT NULL)
AND A_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND A_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPROVAL VALUES (NULL, #{user_id}, #{a_title}, #{a_content}, #{user_id1}, #{user_id2}, #{user_id3}, #{option}, NULL, NULL, NULL, NOW(), #{urgent}, NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE APPROVAL SET A_CONTENT = #{a_content}, OK1 = NULL, OK2 = NULL, OK3 = NULL, REFUSE = '1' WHERE A_NUM = #{a_num}
